items.headline: Freedom from Credit Card Debt : A Realistic Guide On How To Eliminate  Credit Card Debt,  for Good.
objectives_summary: You will learn how to establish a reasonable monthly budget that will allow you to cover all your necessary expenditures and still have money for entertainment as well as save for retirement or education.
You will learn to understand the process of credit card consolidation to help pay off your debt.
You will learn the differences between consolidation and bankruptcy and the benefits of both.

items.title: Kingdom Finance & Multiple Streams of Income
items.headline: Making Multiple Streams of Income and Learning Entrepreneurship ideas
objectives_summary: The students who take this course will gain an understanding in various areas of making money in multiple streams. The students will find that there are so many ways especially on the internet for them to either gainfully find employment, replace their current incomes or to make extra money
Students also will gain some understanding and wisdom in the multiple ways there are to make money on the Internet, and how readily available it is to those who are hungry to learn.
